name: machi-koro-clone
description: Clone/reflavor of the board game Machi Koro

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run tslint
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run watch-debug
scripts.docker-build: npm run build && sudo docker build -t machi-koro-clone:`git rev-parse HEAD` .
scripts.docker-run: npm run docker-build && sudo docker run -p 3000:3000 -it --rm machi-koro-clone run serve-prod
scripts.docker-test: npm run docker-build && sudo docker run -t --rm machi-koro-clone test

author: Dylan Sprague
